column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=As for the jury , it must stay visible .
#Text=Previously , each country sent its two judges and during the contest were kept apart from everyone ...
#Text=Tricking votes would be seen on the screens the night of the Contest and thus it almost never happened .
#Text=What a strange idea also to distinguish between countries which are qualified for [ the final ] and the others !
#Text=It 's a total injustice .
#Text=You see [ Eurovision today ] is not neutral , and do n't [ anyone ] tell me that it 's reasoning from a different age ... It 's just a series of observations ...
#Text=Nobody can contest the fact that certain generations who were the success of Eurovision no longer find their satisfaction in it and are therefore disinterested .
#Text=Nobody can contest , also , that for decades the great Eurovision [ winners ] were international hits that everyone still sings today .
#Text=Who today is capable of singing the titles which win ?
#Text=And what will remain of [ the contest ] in the future ?
#Text=Some viewers were not happy about last year 's entrant , Sébastien Tellier .
#Text=Singing his entry in essentially " franglais , " [ Editor 's note : A mix of words and sentences interchanged between French and English ]
#Text=even a member of Parliament demanded that the next entry be purely in French .
#Text=How did you feel about Tellier 's performance , and do you feel every French entry must be sung in French ?
#Text=Do you feel not singing in English hinders France as an entrant in today 's contest ?
#Text=Once again , I think we must return to the fundamentals .
#Text=Turn the problem however you 'd like but in the end you will arrive at the same conclusions .
#Text=Germany won in German , Spain won in Spanish , Holland won in Dutch , Norway won in Norwegian , etc ...
#Text=What else ?
#Text=I see no reason to abandon everything to English ; anyway I will fight that it not be the case with French !

#Text=I sing in English , I speak English , I love the language of Shakespeare , but if I must represent my country in an international contest , I want to do it in French , and I also want it to be done in French .
#Text=It 's not an issue of chauvinism , it 's an issue of respect with regards to all those who paid with their blood so that France is a full nation .
#Text=It 's the same for the national anthem of my country .
#Text=And I would have the same reasoning whatever my nationality .
#Text=I was born under the sun of France , it 's normal that I love that sun .
#Text=In our first Eurovision interview , we asked the 1982 winner , Nicole , how she felt about the alleged " bloc voting " taking place between the nations of eastern Europe .

column1: #Text=She replied , " The eastern European countries obviously support each other with the so-called ' bloc voting . '
